data.title: Sanyu - Editions, Photographs and Design Hong Kong Friday, June 14, 2024
data.meta_description: View Flowers in a Vase by Sanyu, sold at Editions, Photographs and Design on Hong Kong Auction 14 June 2024. Learn more about the piece and artist, and its final selling price.
